data.text: Monto ahurisie dwom mma Onyankopɔn yɛn ahoɔden;
Momma nnwom no so na monwoso akasaeɛ.
Monhyɛne mmɛntia ɔsrane foforɔ da no,
Ɔka sɛ, “Meyii adesoa no firii mo mmatire so,
Mo ahohiahia mu, mofrɛɛ me na megyee mo,
“Ao me nkurɔfoɔ, montie me kɔkɔbɔ yi,
Ɛnsɛ sɛ monya anyame foforɔ bi wɔ mo mu;
Enti megyaa wɔn maa wɔn akomaden
anka mɛdi wɔn atamfoɔ so ama wɔn ntɛm
Wɔn a wɔtane Awurade no de suro bɛkoto no,
Nanso, wɔde atokoɔ mu atokoɔ papa bɛma mo adi;
